label: Art and Design Supplies
description: Supplies for artists and designers, including drawing tools, paper, and other materials.

subcategories.label: Drawing Tools
subcategories.description: Tools used for drawing and sketching.

subcategories.label: Paper and Surfaces
subcategories.description: Different types of paper and surfaces used for drawing and painting.

subcategories.label: Painting Supplies
subcategories.description: Supplies used for painting, including brushes, paints, and mediums.

subcategories.label: Architectural and Technical Drawing
subcategories.description: Supplies used for architectural and technical drawing, including rulers, compasses, and drafting tables.

subcategories.label: Craft Supplies
subcategories.description: Supplies used for various crafts, including paper crafts, jewelry making, and scrapbooking.
